00021 namespace kernel {

00032 class TriangularKernel
00033 {
00034  public:
00040   TriangularKernel(const double bandwidth = 1.0) : bandwidth(bandwidth) { }
00041 
00048   template<typename Vec1Type, typename Vec2Type>
00049   double Evaluate(const Vec1Type& a, const Vec2Type& b) const
00050   {
00051     return std::max(0.0, (1 - metric::EuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b) /
00052         bandwidth));
00053   }
00054 
00061   double Evaluate(const double distance) const
00062   {
00063     return std::max(0.0, (1 - distance) / bandwidth);
00064   }
00065 
00067   double Bandwidth() const { return bandwidth; }
00069   double& Bandwidth() { return bandwidth; }
00070 
00072   std::string ToString() const
00073   {
00074     std::ostringstream convert;
00075     convert << "TriangularKernel [" << this << "]" << std::endl;
00076     convert << "  Bandwidth: " << bandwidth << std::endl;
00077     return convert.str();
00078   }
00079 
00080  private:
00082   double bandwidth;
00083 };
